content.text:
# List of ministers of the Lithuanian Soviet Socialist Republic

The Council of Ministers of the Lithuanian SSR () was the cabinet (executive branch) of the Lithuanian SSR, one of the republics of the Soviet Union, from March 25, 1946, to March 11, 1990. Its structure and functions were modeled after the Council of Ministers of the Soviet Union. The list below includes government members through June 1987.
